meanings.definition: To surpass in studying or learning.
meanings.sent1: She outstudied her classmates by spending extra time on her homework.
meanings.sent2: He always outstudies his friends by reading ahead in the textbook.
meanings.sent3: The student outstudied the teacher in math, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to learning outstudied any obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: Outstudying the competition, she aced the exam with ease.

meanings.definition: To have studied more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: They outstudied their peers by reviewing the material multiple times.
meanings.sent2: He outstudies his siblings whenever they have a test.
meanings.sent3: The cat outstudied the dog in learning new tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for reading outstudied anyone else in the book club.
meanings.sent5: Outstudying his opponents, he became the top student in the class.
